thread.title: Liverpool boss Jurgen Klopp confirms Daniel Sturridge will miss huge Merseyside clash against Everton
thread.title_full: Liverpool boss Jurgen Klopp confirms Daniel Sturridge will miss huge Merseyside clash against Everton

author: Thomas Bristow
title: Liverpool boss Jurgen Klopp confirms Daniel Sturridge will miss huge Merseyside clash against Everton
text:
Sport Liverpool boss Jurgen Klopp confirms Daniel Sturridge will miss huge Merseyside clash against Everton The Reds can't afford to drop any points as the race for the Premier League's top four hots up Share Get   Thank you for subscribing!   
Jurgen Klopp has confirmed Daniel Sturridge will miss Liverpool's huge lunchtime Merseyside clash against Everton on Saturday. 
The Reds striker was reported to have returned to full training this week but the German dismissed those rumours as nonsense. 
With Liverpool desperate to return to the Premier League's top four this season, news of Sturridge comes as a major blow to the Reds. 
The England forward last started a game nine weeks ago - a League Cup exit at the hands of Southampton. Jurgen Klopp looks dejected (Photo: Getty) 
Ronaldo Koeman has guided Everton to eight wins from their last 12 league games, losing only one. Liverpool have only managed five wins from the same number of matches, losing three. 
Speaking in his press conference on Friday, Klopp said: "No chance [on Sturridge playing]. I heard he was back to training but I donâ€™t know who gave this information. He is working with the rehab coach. No chance this weekend." poll loading What's your Mersey derby prediction? 0+ VOTES SO FAR
